concept.title: Text Insertion Tool
concept.shortdesc: Inserts text in to the canvas, represented by a 't'.

section.p: With the Text Tool palette item selected, a click on the canvas brings up a dialog for text entry. Multi line text can be entered by entering multi lines of text. When using the text tool, if the cursor shown is a ibeam then a single click will enable the text to be edited.

When the Text Tool item is selected, hot spots will appear on elements. If the hot spot is selected when the mouse is clicked, the text will be anchored to that element, in that position. If the element is moved or resized, the text will still be anchored to that position. Connectors can also be annotated in the same way, a hot spot will appear in the centre of the connector, allowing for text to be anchored at the centre of the connector.
